feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two cover‑related features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of all frontend files with brief explanations of their purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the animated background and book navigator.
frontend/src/components/background/Anima: Full‑screen layered gradient and grain background with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/book/BookNavigat: Controls page navigation, layout mode, and flip animations for the portfolio book.
frontend/src/components/book/PageFlipLay: Renders the animated page‑flip overlay based on direction.
frontend/src/components/book/PaginationI: Shows current spread number in a small fixed badge.
frontend/src/components/book/useBookLayo: Hook that switches between single and double page layouts based on viewport width.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Ab: Editorial two‑column About page with background, philosophy, and experience sections.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Co: Two‑column contact page with email, location, and social links.
Renders the portfolio cover with a portrait, title, and basic personal details.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Pr: Displays a project with title, image placeholder, description, role, and tech stack.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Sk: Shows categorized skills and a list of offered services using static arrays.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Ta: Generates a table of contents by listing portfolio pages beyond the first two.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/portfoli: Defines the ordered list of portfolio pages and their associated React components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook detecting the user's reduced-motion preference via media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook for future backend React Query integrations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with extensive CSS variables and editorial-themed styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugins tailored to an editorial aesthetic.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, including features, requirements, and visual/functional goals for the portfolio site.
